name: Nike Air Max 270
description: A trendy, lightweight running shoe with a large Air Max unit in the heel for comfort and bounce. The upper is made of breathable mesh, making it ideal for everyday wear.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
description: Known for its incredible cushioning and energy return, the Ultraboost 22 is a versatile running shoe that offers a snug, sock-like fit with a Primeknit upper.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star High Top
description: A classic casual sneaker with a canvas upper and rubber sole, featuring the iconic star logo. It’s timeless and works well with casual outfits.
image: Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star High Top.jpg

name: Vans Old Skool
description: A low-top skate shoe with the signature side stripe, durable suede and canvas upper, and a waffle rubber outsole for traction. A great everyday shoe.

name: Puma RS-X
description: A chunky, retro-inspired sneaker with a mix of leather, suede, and mesh. It provides a bold look and great comfort for streetwear enthusiasts.

name: New Balance 990v5
description: A premium running and walking shoe that’s famous for its balance of cushioning and stability. Made with quality suede and mesh materials.

name: Reebok Classic Leather
description: A throwback sneaker made of soft leather for comfort and durability. Its clean, minimalist look works well for both casual and semi-casual wear.

name: Timberland 6-Inch Premium Waterproof Boots
description: A rugged work boot made from waterproof leather with a padded collar for comfort. Designed for tough conditions while still being stylish.

name: Crocs Classic Clog
description: Lightweight foam clogs known for their comfort and ventilation. Easy to slip on, they are perfect for casual, outdoor, or water activities.

name: Birkenstock Arizona Sandals
description: A comfortable two-strap sandal with contoured cork footbeds that mold to your feet. Known for durability and support, perfect for warm-weather casual wear.
